description: This file defines a Flutter widget for a dashboard screen that displays financial metrics such as income, expenses, and budgets. It fetches data from an API endpoint ('/dashboard') and renders various UI components based on the fetched data.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the main dashboard screen in the app.

classes.name: _DashboardScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the DashboardScreen widget's state, including data fetching, error handling, and UI building.

methods.name: _load
methods.description: Fetches dashboard data from the API and updates the state accordingly.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the widget by calling _load to fetch data when the widget is inserted into the tree.

methods.name: _money
methods.description: Formats a number as a currency string with a dollar sign.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree based on current state, showing loading indicator, error messages, or dashboard data.

methods.name: _metricCard
methods.description: Creates a styled card widget displaying a financial metric.
